summary: 2 young women reunite and rekindle their friendship after having said goodbye at their college graduation, six years earlier.
cast: Katrin Cartlidge|Lynda Steadman|Kate Byers|Mark Benton|Andy Serkis|Joe Tucker|Margo Stanley|Michael Healy|Goran Kostic
keywords: london england|female protagonist|primrose hill london|reference to sherlock holmes|reference to lady godiva
title: Dos chicas de hoy
